articles.content: Now it is possible to monitor near real-time drought conditions, thanks to a novel technology developed by UNIST scientists. Scientists improved the accuracy of satellite-based soil moisture estimate… [+2222 chars]

articles.title: Five asteroids are set to fly past the planet today — two of them are bigger than the Eiffel Tower - Business Insider India
articles.description: Five asteroids are set to make a close approach to Earth today, on January 6.Two of the asteroids — 2016 CO247 and 2008 AF4 — are bigger than the Eiffel Tower.

articles.description: Proxima Centauri, which is a red dwarf star is orbited by two known planets, one of which is in the 'habitable zone' that could support Earth-like conditions.
